name: Skilify For Education & Learning Management System
description:
“Skilify is a unique online learning website template designed keeping in the mind the latest trends and with an aim to simplify and make the online learning experience better for the students and the teachers. This Web Application is designed based on UX Research inorder to provide the best experience that boosts the conversions and make students fall in love with the learning, This App is the best fit for the one looking to launch their own online learning platform or planning to take their offline coaching business online utilizing the power of the web. This Web Application design features a unique design. The Application is designed in adobe Xd and is prototype-ready so you can feel the user flow and provide you all with the application that you need in order to get your e-learning website build. ”


You can download it from here
